description.en:
The daily experiences of modern monster girls.   
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.
description.pt-br:
As experiências diárias de garotas monstro modernas.
Quadrinhos originais por Shepherd0821

altTitles.zh: 学園殺人ゲーム Dead Tube
学院里的杀人游戏

description.en: Distributing thrilling videos in secret! A school game that puts life and death on the line!
description.ja: 映画研究部に所属する業得学園2年・町谷智浩は学園トップクラスの美少女・真城舞に、ある日突然、声をかけられる。なんでも2日間だけ、24時間完全密着の撮影をしてほしいとのこと。同行する町谷だったが……!?
description.kk: Мектеп оқушылары киноклубта не түсіреді? Күнделікті өмірдің бөлшектері, әуесқой қорқынышты фильмдер... бұның бәрі зеріктіріп жібереді... бірақ бұл жолы емес! Басты кейіпкер Томохиро Мачиге, киноклуб операторы, мектептегі қыз бірнеше күнге оны түсіруді ұсынады. Ол ерекше ынталы емес болсада, бірақ ол да бас тартпайды. Егер жігіт бұл оның өміріндегі ең қызықты және қорқынышты фильм болатынын білгенде...
description.ru: Что могут снимать школьники в клубе любителей кино? Зарисовки из повседневности, любительские фильмы ужасов… скука полная… но только не в этот раз! Главному герою Томохиро Мачии, оператору киноклуба, одна девушка из школы предлагает поснимать её несколько дней. Он особо не горит желанием, но и не отказывается. Если бы парень только знал, что это будет самый захватывающий и будоражащий фильм в его жизни…

altTitles.zh: 浪客行

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.
description.es-la:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

description.en:
By chaos, the world began to be invaded.

One day, gates suddenly appeared in the world, unleashing monsters upon humanity.

The situation brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

The martial world of “Eun,” the world of magic and knights “Einhart,”

and the world of demons “Gehenna” became interconnected, and superhumans from these worlds swept away the monsters.

However, they were not righteous saviors.

Under the law of survival of the fittest, the newly emerged “Players” of Earth were oppressed.

Lee Ro-Woon sought to mediate between the Players and the superhumans from other worlds, aiming to bring peace to the world.

But due to the discomfort of the superhumans from other worlds with his actions and the betrayal of his comrades,

Lee Ro-Woon lost everything and fell into ruin.

At the moment he was about to give up everything, he became the vessel of chaos and was transported to a sealed world.

There, he encountered three supreme beings.

Lee Ro-Woon becomes the disciple of the Three Kings and rises to rule over everything!

The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

title.en: I Became the Mother of the Evil Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Became the Mother of the Tragic Male Lead
I Became the Mother of the Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Mother of a Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Bloodthirsty Male Lead's Mother

altTitles.fr: Je suis la mère du anti-héros

altTitles.pt-br: Eu me tornei a mãe do protagonista louco

altTitles.es: Reencarne cómo la madre del protagonista masculino loco obsesionado

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la madre del protagonista masculino que era un producto de desecho

altTitles.th: ฉันกลายเป็นแม่พระเอกนิยายจอมเสเพล

altTitles.ja: 闇堕ち主人公のママになりました

altTitles.zh: 成了病态男主的亲妈
成为颓废文男主的妈妈

description.en: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam, the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants, even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?

altTitles.ja: ダブルヘリクス ブロッサム

description.en: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.
description.ja:
2人の少女が織りなすSFバディアクション

警察官である19歳の少女・東雲菊は、とある事件を捜査している最中、大けがを負ってしまう。現代の医療では治療不可能とされた彼女に残された唯一の道は、長き眠りにつく「コールドスリープ」であった・・・。次に彼女の意識が戻ったのは、60年後の日本――！

そこで犯罪を取り締まっているのは、彼女が所属していたかつての警察ではなく、民間の警察組織だった。そうした中、重犯罪者・月下香とバディを組むことに…。長き眠りから覚めた菊と、超能力を使う香。

description.en: Minazo, an eight-year old boy living in Tokyo during the times of scorching heat, is saddened by his parents’ divorce and family separation while he seeks comfort in the popular manga Mokumoku Man. It’s author, Shishio, much like Minazo, is unable to fulfill that certain hole in his heart. Together, where will the chaotic world woven by their thoughts and prayers lead?

altTitles.ja: もふもふと異世界冒険メシ

description.en: Company employee Sano Jyu, who had a frail constitution, always had a sensation of heat inside his body. Then, he collapses due to the combination of a busy season and an outburst of fever. Then the goddess appears and tells him. You have made a mistake in the world in which you should be born. The cause of the fever is magical power, and he was born with magical power in a world without magical power. ...... Itsuki is reborn in another world with a healthy body and more magical power than any other person, just as he wished, thanks to the power of the goddess. And with the legendary magical beast born from the egg he was given as his partner, he begins his second life as an adventurer. ......
description.ja: 虚弱体質だった会社員・佐野樹はいつも体の内側に熱を持つ感覚を抱いていた。そして、繁忙期と熱の暴走が重なって倒れてしまう。すると女神様が現れ、彼に伝える。生まれるべき世界を間違えた。熱の原因は魔力で、魔力のない世界で魔力を持って生まれてしまったのだと……。女神様の力で願い通りの健康な体に加え、人一倍の魔力を持って異世界に生まれ変わったイツキ。そして、授かった卵から生まれた伝説の魔獣を相棒に、冒険者として第二の人生を歩み始める……！

description.en: Gamer girls were transported to a mysterious location and have to play games. Maybe if they win they will be able to leave..?

title.en: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess Noble Lady

altTitles.zh: 恶魔女仆只想被恶役千金欺负

altTitles.zh-ro: Èmó nǚpū zhǐ xiǎng bèi è yì qiānjīn qīfù

altTitles.en: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess

description.en:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....

title.en: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin

altTitles.en: The Regressed Son of a Duke Is an Assassin
The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

altTitles.es: El asesino que retornó como el hijo del Duque
El pibe que retorna como el hijo menor

altTitles.es-la: La venganza del asesino de la espada demoniaca

altTitles.th: ลูกชายคนเล็กของดยุกคือมือสังหาร

altTitles.ja: 回帰した公爵家の末息子は暗殺者

altTitles.zh: 公爵家的重生暗杀者

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no Koto ga Daidaidaidaidaisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo
Kimi no Koto ga Dai Dai Dai Dai Daisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho
Mis 100 novias que me quieren mucho mucho

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.it: Le 100 fidanzate che ti amano tanto tanto tanto tanto tanto
Le 100 ragazze che ti amano tanto tanto tanto tanto tanto

altTitles.es: Mis 100 Novias Que Me Quieren Mogollón Mogollón

description.en: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.es:
Rentaro Aijou es una máquina de declararse y de recibir calabazas, consiguiendo la cifra de 100 rechazos al final de la secundaria. Roto por dentro, va a rezar a un santuario de suerte en el amor para pedir que la fortuna le sonría. Para su sorpresa, el dios del santuario se le aparece y le promete que conocerá a 100 almas gemelas durante el bachillerato.

Aunque al principio cree que le ha tomado el pelo, el primer día de clase se le declaran dos chicas en cuanto lo conocen, así que ve que sus rezos funcionaron y la cosa pinta bien. Sin embargo, hay un pequeño detalle que el dios no le explicó: si alguna de estas almas gemelas no consigue establecer una relación con él, esa chica morirá. Su gran corazón hace que no pueda permitir que eso suceda en ningún caso y por eso, ¡decide que saldrá con todas ellas!

¡Su nueva e inesperada vida de bachillerato, llena de amor, confusiones y un montón de chicas, le depara una sorpresa tras otra!

(Fuente: Editorial Ivrea)
description.ja: 「好き」っていいたい！いわれたい！中学卒業式に100回目の失恋をした愛城恋太郎は、高校でこそ初めての彼女を！と願う。そんな彼の前に現れた恋の神様が告げた未来は「高校生活で出会う“運命の人”は100人。しかし彼女達は、幸せになれなければなんやかんや（中略）あって…死ぬ」　突然始まるDEAD OR LOVEな純愛ハーレムライフ!!　絶対に脱落しない・させない！
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

description.en: Yukari Maki, a diligent high school girl. One day, she spots her classmate, Yusuke Kusaka, who was rumored to be a delinquent, singing a love song. Never having imagined such a sweet, yet sad, singing voice could come from him, Yukari was instantly captivated—without knowing that it would soon be the beginning of a sad, unrequited love.
description.pt-br: Yukari Maki, uma estudante diligente do ensino médio. Um dia, ela vê seu colega de classe, Yusuke Kusaka, que dizem ser um delinquente, cantando uma canção de amor. Nunca tendo imaginado que uma voz tão doce, mas triste, pudesse vir dele, Yukari foi instantaneamente cativada - sem saber que em breve seria o início de um amor triste e não correspondido.

title.en: Manga de Tsudzuru Yuri na Hibi

altTitles.ja: まんがで綴る百合な日々
まんがで綴る百合な日々 女×女のバカップル同棲日記

altTitles.ja-ro: Manga de Tsudzuru Yuri na Hibi - Onna x Onna Bakappuru Dousei Nikki

description.en:
Negi is an illustrator, and Tanu is a career woman.

The two are a female couple. ♪

"I wonder what it means to love someone?"
"Am I weird or something?"

While Tanu was struggling with these worries, she met Negi through a hobby.
Meanwhile, Negi had been interested in Tanu ever since they first met.

After a long-distance relationship, they are now living together, and their dream is, of course, same-sex marriage!
Why not take a peek into the lives of these lovey-dovey girls
through this non-fiction four-panel comic?

altTitles.ja: 大人になれない僕らは

altTitles.es-la: Nosotros que no podemos convertirnos en adultos

altTitles.zh: 无法成为大人的我们

description.en:
The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)
description.es-la: ¡El último trabajo de Jo Fujita en Commuting Student Diary! Esta es nuestra tonta e interminable historia de cómo matamos el tiempo una y otra vez el 7 de julio. ¡Una historia de amor en bucle temporal de dos estudiantes de preparatoria atrapados en una "eterna juventud"!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kokuyou no Hanayome - Imikirawareta Watashi ga Reikoku Taii ni Aisareru Made

altTitles.ja: 黒妖の花嫁 ～忌み嫌われた私が冷酷大尉に愛されるまで～

altTitles.en: Bride of the Black Demon: How I Was Detested, Then Loved by The Ruthless Captain

description.en: In the Yamatoba Empire, where two races, humans and night demons, have existed since time immemorial. Iku, whose hair and eyes are as pale as white snow, is mistreated by her family because of her strange, demon-like appearance. She is treated as little more than a servant until the day she is sold to a man for money, a fate she thought impossible to escape from... One day, however, the next head of a prominent family, Subaru, learns of Iku's secret and offers her a marriage proposal. Though it is a political marriage, the two, both burdened with a damaged past, gradually become attracted to each other...? A love story of destiny unfolds as the hearts of a couple who have never known love melt together!

title.en: The Strange Adventure of a Broke Mercenary

altTitles.ja: 食い詰め傭兵の幻想奇譚
Fantasie Geshichte von soldner in groBer Armut

altTitles.en: The Strange Fantasy Story Of A Broke Mercenary

altTitles.zh: 穷苦佣兵的幻想奇谭

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวการผจญภัยสุดประหลาดของนายทหารถังแตก

altTitles.de: Fantasie Geschichte eines Söldners in Armut

description.en:
After the soldiers’ mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)

altTitles.ja: 犬飼さん家の押しかけJK

description.en: One day, the thirty-something salaryman Inukai met a high school girl Komugi who claimed to be the reincarnation of his childhood dog. Now she comes over every day looking to play with her owner, but her pet antics don't seem so innocent in human form! A semi-cohabitation comedy between a dog-girl and a single office worker!
description.ja: アラサー独身サラリーマンの犬飼はある日、こむぎと名乗る女子高生に出会う。こむぎは自身を犬飼の愛犬の生まれ変わりだと言い、毎日彼の家に通い詰める…！

title.en: Kankei Kaizen wo Akiramete Kyori wo Oitara, Shiotaioudatta Konyakusha ga Karande Kuru you ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 関係改善をあきらめて距離をおいたら、塩対応だった婚約者が絡んでくるようになりました

altTitles.ja-ro: Kankei Kaizen wo Akiramete Kyori wo Oitara, Shiotaiou datta Konyakusha ga Karande Kuru you ni Narimashita

altTitles.en: After Giving Up on Improving Our Relationship and Distancing Myself, My Salty Fiancé Began to Pester Me

description.en:
"I was forced to take Beatrice as my fiancée. I was reluctant from the beginning."

Beatrice, the hated duke's daughter, knew that her fiancé, Prince Ernest, was saying that. She decides to keep her distance from the prince.

"Come to think of it, until now I've been so obsessed with Ernest that I haven't interacted much with other people. What a shame."

For some reason, Ernest, who has been avoiding her until now, is now actively getting involved with her, but she simply wants to enjoy her academy life with her good-looking Margrave son and her good-natured friends. It's coming–?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1691gn/)
description.ja:
「ビアトリスは強引に俺の婚約者におさまったんだ。俺は最初から不本意だった」婚約者であるアーネスト王子がそう言っているのを知ってしまった、嫌われ者の公爵令嬢ビアトリス。彼女は王子と距離を置くことを決意する。「そういえば私は今までアーネスト様にかまけてばかりで、他の方々とあまり交流してこなかったわね。もったいないことをしたものだわ」気持ちを切り替え、美貌の辺境伯令息や気のいい友人たちと学院生活を楽しむ彼女に、今まで塩対応だったアーネストが、なぜか積極的に絡んでくるようになり――!?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1691gn/)

description.en: In the city of Ergastulum, a shady ville filled with made men and petty thieves, whores on the make and cops on the take, there are some deeds too dirty for even its jaded inhabitants to touch. Enter the Handymen, Nic and Worick, who take care of the jobs no one else will handle. Until the day when a cop they know on the force requests their help in taking down a new gang muscling in on the territory of a top Mafia family. It seems like business (and mayhem) as usual, but the Handymen are about to find that this job is a lot more than they bargained for.
description.ru: У Вас течёт кран? Отломалась ножка стула? Завелись тараканы? В предприимчивой Японии в таких случаях звонят в специальную контору, «мастерам на все руки», которые всё починят, со всем помогут, все проблемы решат. Называются такие мастера абстрактным словом «Бенрия». Вот только где-то есть районы, где «бытовые» проблемы имеют широкий криминальный масштаб, а вредители — крупные и злобные двуногие, от которых «дрожат» даже иные тюрьмы. Вот на таких улицах и переулках вырастают свои «Бенрия», которые также без вопросов приведут любой объект хозяйствования в состояние «нет проблем». У Вас всё ещё проблемы? Не раздумывая звоните Уорику и Николасу: приятная секретарша всегда ответит на звонок — и специалист немедленно отправится Вам на помощь, прихватив пистолет, катану и прочий рабочий инструмент.

title.en: I'm in Love with the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 我的推是坏人大小姐
我的首推是恶役大小姐

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的首推是惡役大小姐

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shǒutuī shì è yì dà xiǎojiě

altTitles.th: ทำไงดีเกมนี้นางร้ายน่ารัก

altTitles.zh: 我推是反派大小姐

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Oshi wa Akuyaku Reijou.

altTitles.es-la: Mi Oshi Es Una Villa Noble

description.de:
Oohashi Rei - eigentlich eine ganz normale Büroangestellte - wacht eines Tages im Körper der Protagonistin ihres absoluten Lieblingsspiels "Revolution" auf. Eigentlich geht es in dem Spiel darum, mit einem von drei absolut wundervollen Prinzen zusammenzukommen. Ein klassisches Otome-Game, und wenn es nach Rei geht, auch das mit Abstand beste.  
Ihr Hauptinteresse lag dabei jedoch nicht etwa an einem der männlichen Charaktere, sondern an Claire François, der Antagonistin des Spiels.

Wird Rei es schaffen, eine romantische Beziehung zu ihr aufzubauen? Wie werden die eigentlichen Stars des Spiels, die drei Prinzen, auf diese Situation reagieren?  
Und was hält Claire überhaupt davon?
description.en:
Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game, *Revolution*. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favourite character, Claire François – the main antagonist of the story!

Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!
description.fr:
Rei Ôhashi, une simple employée de bureau d’une petite entreprise, se retrouve soudainement dans le corps de l’héroïne de son jeu vidéo de drague préféré, Revolution.
Maintenant sous le nom de Rae Taylor, elle est prête à accomplir son objectif.
Passer du bon temps avec les princes du jeu ? Non.
Son cœur appartient à la méchante de l’histoire, Claire François.
Bien décidée à la chérir et à rester à ses côtés, sa nouvelle vie commence dans un monde empreint de magie !
description.id: Seorang pegawai kantor biasa, Oohashi Rei, bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang Heroine bernama Rei Taylor di Game Otome favoritnya, "Revolution". Kebetulan lagi, orang pertama yang menyambutnya adalah karakter favoritnya, Claire Francois- antagonis dari cerita ini! Kini Rei bertekad untuk membangun hubungan romantis dengan Claire, bukan dengan pemeran utama pria. Lantas, bagaimanakah gadis jahat yang dia cintai akan bereaksi terhadap kemesraan baru ini?!
description.it:
La normale impiegata Oohashi Rei si sveglia nel corpo della protagonista del suo gioco otome preferito, Revolution. Per la sua gioia, la prima persona che incontra è anche il suo personaggio preferito, Claire François, l'antagonista principale della storia! Ora Rei è determinata a perseguire una storia d'amore con Claire piuttosto che con gli interessi amorosi maschili. Ma come reagirà la sua amata antagonista a questo nuovo corteggiamento?!
L'anime debutterà ad ottobre 2023!
Annunciato il manga ufficiale italiano!
description.ja: 乙女ゲーム『Revolution』の世界に、ヒロインのレイ＝テイラーとして転生した社畜OL・大橋零。そんな彼女の推しは攻略対象の王子たち…ではなく、悪役令嬢・クレア＝フランソワだった!　前世でゲームをやりこんでいたレイは、その知識と愛で、クレアとお近づきになることができるのか？
description.es-la: Oohashi Rei, una trabajadora de oficina ordinaria se despierta en el cuerpo de la protagonista de su juego otome favorito, "Revolution". Para su deleite, la primera persona en saludarla es también su personaje favorito, Claire Francois, ¡la principal antagonista de la historia! Ahora, Rei está decidida a enamorarse de Claire en lugar de los protagonistas masculinos del juego. ¿Pero cómo reaccionará la villana ante este nuevo cortejo?

altTitles.th: ผู้โดยสารในโลกแฟนตาซี

altTitles.zh: 奇幻世界过客

description.en: A 22-year-old worker, Ren Zheng, reunites with his old friend during graduation season. A moment of light-hearted banter is taken seriously by the god of reincarnation, who sends Ren Zheng and his friend into a fantastical world as part of their graduation. The two are reincarnated as an [Angel] and a [Demon] respectively, and embark on a series of funny and thrilling adventures.
description.zh: 22岁的打工人任郑和自己的老朋友毕业季叙旧，一时的调侃被转生之神信以为真，转世之神将其任郑附带毕业季送往一个奇幻世界，二人分别转生为【天使】和【恶魔】，并且踏上了各种搞笑和刺激冒险故事。

description.en:
A naga starts a new job in a new town.

Posted with [author permission](https://twitter.com/DanielLCarrier/status/1769140595296207140).

---
Alternative Official English: [TheDuckWebComics](https://www.theduckwebcomics.com/Snake_in_the_office/5771894/)

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Bakuen wo!

altTitles.pt-br: Traga Explosões Para Este Mundo Maravilhoso!

altTitles.en: Konosuba: An Explosion on This Wonderful World!
Gifting this Wonderful World with Explosions!

altTitles.ru: Да будет взорван этот прекрасный мир!

altTitles.ja: この素晴らしい世界に爆焔を！

description.en: A spin-off of Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! that focuses on Megumin.
description.ru: Спин-офф «Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!», который расскажет о Мегумин.
description.pt-br:
As membras do Clã Mágico Carmesim, Megumin e Yunyun, estão no topo de sua classe, mas ainda têm muito a aprender. Yunyun começou a aprender magia avançada, mas Megumin seguiu um caminho diferente - o caminho da magia de explosão! Apesar de ter sido avisada de sua utilidade é limitada, Megumin acredita que a magia de explosão é o caminho para ela se tornar uma grande e voluptuosa feiticeira, e ela não será convencida do contrário!

Um Spin-Off de Konosuba com o foco na personagem Megumin.

title.en: After Being Reborn I Was Surrounded by Enemy Cubs

altTitles.zh: 重生后身边全是仇人幼崽

description.en:
After a miscalculation, Princess Stephanie, who holds supreme power in the empire, dies mysteriously on the eve of her coronation as Queen.
Stephanie opens her eyes filled with endless doubts and anger, only to find herself reborn in a small border town in the Aiello Empire. She thought she would be far away from the political center, but soon realizes that the people around her are all familiar... cubs (children)?!
From their conversations, she learns that her enemies have thrived after her death and become powerful bosses. What should she do now?
"After Rebirth, I'm Surrounded by Enemy Cubs."

altTitles.ja: ガンダムエグザ　ブイエス

description.en:
Gundam EXA VS (ガンダム EXA VS) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by Kōichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2014 to be tied in with the arcade Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Maxi Boost. It's the sequel to the previous manga series, Gundam EXA.

Some time after the events of Gundam EXA, Sthesia Awar informs Leos Alloy that she discovered a new GA data cluster from a computer outside of Jupiter X. The two dive into the new data and find themselves in the Universal Century, during the attack on Side 7. However, after entering the colony, they find that the inside was in ruins, and the RX-78-02 Gundam has been destroyed before it could be activated by Amuro Ray.

altTitles.ja: ゲーセン少女と異文化交流

altTitles.ja-ro: Game Center Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu

altTitles.ja: Cultural Exchange With Game Center Girl

altTitles.en: Cultural Exchange With A Game Center Girl
Cross-Cultural Exchange With the Girl at the Arcade

altTitles.zh: 与游戏中心的少女异文化交流的故事

altTitles.zh-hk: 與遊戲中心的少女異文化交流的故事

description.en: A Japanese arcade worker meets a young girl from England and strikes up a friend(?)ship.

Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: A High School With Only Men
Kimi yo de Ato Mou Sukoshi

altTitles.ru: Ещё немного, чтобы дотянуться до тебя

description.en: Haruko is a girl who worries about her height. Sho is a boy who worries about his shortness. Haruko befriends the cheerful Maki, Sho is friends with the caring Kouta. This is a warm and touching story about their youth.
description.ru: Харуко - девочка, переживающая из-за своего высокого роста. Сё - мальчик, переживающий из-за своего низкого роста. Харуко дружит с весёлой Маки, Сё - с заботливым Коутой. Это тёплая и щемящая история об их юности.

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.es-la: El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere

altTitles.vi: Nhân Vật Phản Diện Đại Sư Huynh, Tất Cả Các Sư Muội Đều Là Bệnh Kiều
Nhân Vật Phản Diện Đại Sư Huynh, Tất Cả Các Sư Muội Đều Là Yandere

altTitles.uk: Старший брат-наставник - лиходій, а молодші сестри-наставниці ціловито божевільні

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

Lyle Walt is a young noble boy and heir looking forward to the day he can inherit his family’s territory. Except around when he was 10 year old, his parents started neglecting him more and more in favour of his little sister, Ceres.

On his fifteenth birthday, he is challenged to a duel by his sister to see who will inherit the household and horribly loses, being cast out of his family. Afterwards, he gets treated by the family groundskeepers and receives the family heirloom Gem from him that Lyle’s grandfather had entrusted to him. From there, he begins an aimless journey with his childhood friend and former fiancée, Novem, and the Gem-turned-Jewel that houses the memories, personalities, and Skills of seven of his ancestors.
description.ja:
自身の家族に裏切られ、失意のライエルの前に現れた七人の先祖達…彼らは敵か味方か！？宝玉をめぐる剣と魔法のバトルロワイヤル！！

女神を崇め、剣と魔法が存在する世界で貴族の嫡男として生まれたライエル。過去には天才、麒麟児ともてはやされ期待されたライエルだが、すべてを完璧にこなす妹セレスによって屋敷内で冷遇されていってしまう。そのセレスに思いついたかのようにライエルとの戦いを提案され、セレスと対峙すことになったライエル。全てが上をいくセレスに無様に敗れたライエルは、跡取りの座をセレスに奪われ存在そのものも失われてしまう。傷つき失意したライエルだったが、屋敷の庭に住み込む老人に助けられ、宝玉のついた首飾りを受け取る。それは老人が先代─ライエルの祖父から預かっていた、【アーツ】が記録された青い玉は、ウォルト家の家宝とも言うべき物だった。 歴代当主七人のアーツが記録された宝玉を託されたライエルは、それを持って屋敷を去るのだった。

description.en: Yumeko dreams of being a pampered princess, but reality has her living in a shitty old apartment building. With a forest on the roof. And a witch in the forest. Tadaa! Maybe she can get this witch (who is a guy, weird) to magically grant all her wishes, up to and including making her destined prince (high school crush) fall in love with her.
description.es:
Yumeko, es una chica de secundaria soñadora que vive con su familia en uno de los apartamentos de un complejo residencial poco habitado. La persona que administra dicho complejo es Kokage-kun, un hikikomori que vive en la azotea del edificio, y que resulta ser una bruja.  
Yumeko a menudo le pide a Kokage-kun que use su magia para ayudarla a realizar algún deseo egoísta que tenga.  
Por ejemplo, cuando su amor platónico, un senpai de la escuela, empieza de repente a fijarse en ella y la invita a salir.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Artist’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/13787628)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Artist’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/komoriyouko)

altTitles.ja: 可愛い上司を困らせたい

altTitles.en: I Want to Annoy the Pretty Boss

altTitles.pt-br: Quero judiar da minha linda chefinha

altTitles.es: Quiero molestar a mi linda jefa

altTitles.vi: Tôi muốn được chọc ghẹo bà sếp dễ thương của mình

description.en: Ira Megumi is a 31-year-old woman who is currently at the top of her career. She's a beautiful woman who's brimming with pride and totally has no interest in love or marriage. Though the next morning, she wakes up and finds the new employee, Aoki Shun, sleeping next to her. Just what in the world happened?!
description.ja: 井羅恵は31歳の食品会社次長。仕事に全てを捧げ、恋愛や結婚は二の次に。そんな彼女の前に、要領が良い新人男子・青木が現れる。彼の言動にいらつく恵だが、飲み会で酔った挙句、青木と一夜を共にして…。
description.pt-br: Ira Megumi é uma mulher que desistiu de ter uma família ou de agir como uma simples mulher e se dedicou arduamente em seu trabalho, assim chegando ao cargo de vice-diretora em uma grande empresa. Aoki Shun um novato na empresa, amigável, porém desleixado e não parece levar o novo trabalho a sério. Mas algo acontece na festa de boas vindas dos novatos na empresa e Ira acorda ao lado de Aoki na cama… O que diabos aconteceu? Será possível um relacionamento amoroso entre duas pessoas tão diferentes?

description.en: Girls, guns, and grenades! Meet Rally Vincent and Minnie May. By day, they work at the Chicago gun shop that they own. By night (or holidays or week-ends), they moonlight as a pair of bounty hunters called the Gunsmith Cats. Rally is an expert at firearms, being able to judge the condition of a gun with a glance, and being an expert marksman. Minnie May is younger and less disciplined; and has an absolute fascination with explosives. Lots of explosives. Especially big ones. Together, they form an unbeatable team; much to the consternation of the local ATF bureau. Set in the city of Chicago, this action-adventure series features a lot of gunfights, car chases, and general mayhem.
description.es-la: ¡Chicas, armas y granadas! Les presento a Rally Vincent y Minnie May. De día, trabajan en la armería de Chicago que poseen. Por la noche (o los días festivos o fines de semana), trabajan como un par de cazarrecompensas llamados los Gatos Armeros (Gunsmith Cats). Rally es una experta en armas de fuego, capaz de juzgar el estado de un arma con sólo una mirada, y siendo una experta tiradora. Minnie May es más joven y menos disciplinada; y tiene una absoluta fascinación por los explosivos. Muchos explosivos. Especialmente los grandes. Juntas, forman un equipo imbatible; para consternación de la oficina local de la ATF. Ambientada en la ciudad de Chicago, esta serie de acción-aventura presenta muchos tiroteos, persecuciones de coches y caos general.
description.pt-br: Garotas, armas e granadas! Conheça Rally Vincent e Minnie May. Durante o dia, elas trabalham na loja de armas de sua propriedade em Chicago. À noite (ou feriados ou fins de semana), elas trabalham como uma dupla de caçadoras de recompensas chamadas de Gunsmith Cats. Rally é uma especialista em armas de fogo, sendo capaz de julgar a condição de uma arma com um olhar e sendo uma atiradora experiente. Minnie May é mais jovem e menos disciplinada; e tem um fascínio absoluto por explosivos. Muitos explosivos. Especialmente os grandes. Juntos, elas formam uma equipe imbatível; para grande consternação do escritório local do ATF. Passada na cidade de Chicago, esta série de ação e aventura apresenta muitos tiroteios, perseguições de carros e confusão geral.

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の追放後！ 教会改革ごはんで悠々シスター暮らし

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou no Tsuihougo! Kyoukai Kaikaku gohan de Yuuyuu Sister Kurashi

altTitles.en: The Banished Villainess! Living the Leisurely Life of a Nun Making Revolutionary Church Food

altTitles.es: La villana desterrada viviendo la vida tranquila de una monja haciendo comida revolucionaria en una iglesia

altTitles.zh: 恶役千金流放后！利用教会改革美食过上悠然的修女生活

description.en: Event planner Yuka Sawatani‘s life ended as the result of overwork. Reborn into an Otome game with her memory intact, she becomes the villainess Elizabeth. She tries to resist her fate, but at the ending of the game, she is promptly banished.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

title.en: Shiretto Sugee Koto Itteru Gal. - Shiritsu Paranomaru Koukou no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: しれっとすげぇこと言ってるギャル。ー私立パラの丸高校の日常ー

altTitles.ja-ro: Shiretto Sugee Koto Itteru Gal. - Shiritsu Para no Maru Koukou no Nichijou

altTitles.en: The Gals Who Always Say Incredible Things: My Daily Life at a Private Paranormal High School

altTitles.zh-hk: 一臉平靜地談論著不得了的話題的辣妹。──私立超能力高校的日常──

description.en:
Youth = friendship, effort, and future prediction! A very ordinary and supernatural daily life led by the strongest and most invincible gyarus with different abilities.

Based on the short animations on Youtube. 
- [Official YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@parako)
- [Official Twitter/X](https://twitter.com/parako_official)
___
[Alt Official Raw (Young Jump)](https://ynjn.jp/title/11987)
description.ja: 青春＝友情、努力、未来予知!? 最強無敵の異能力ギャルが送る、ごくごく普通の超常的な日常。 累計再生数1.6億回！本作の元となったYoutubeチャンネル「私立パラの丸高校」では、みらい＆ へー子の最強異能力ギャルズの他、光やクラスメイト達の声優ボイス付き動画がたくさん見れるので、ぜひチェックしてみてください!!

altTitles.zh: 学士再生

description.en:
A martial artist, claiming himself to be a "murderer" is defeated by a suicide attack in battle and is reborn as a first born child to a local lord. Having a fresh start, a warm family and a little sister to protect - he decides to become a better person in his new life.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EC%9E%AC%EC%83%9D/2121)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Reinkarnasi-Sang-Pendekar/3329)
description.id:
Setelah bereinkarnasi menjadi anak bernama Hwang Junwoo, dia menjalani hidup yang berbeda dengan kehidupan sebelumnya. seiring berjalannya waktu, dia melatih ilmu bela dirinya agar menjadi pendekar terhebat, namun ada banyak pihak yang tidak senang dengan keluarganya. mampukah dia menghadapi segala cobaan di kehidupannya yang baru?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EC%9E%AC%EC%83%9D/2121)
---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/ComicInfo/id/621036)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/34746)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Reinkarnasi-Sang-Pendekar/3329)
description.ja:
7回の夜を経て天下一になった男、「趙・俊宇」。 彼を処断しようとする連中に追われて、長い戦いの末、天池で死を迎えた。 これで全てが終わったと思った瞬間、目を覚ましたら赤ん坊になっていた!！ 天下一の黄金を蓄えている大商人の長男に生まれ変わった「趙・俊宇」は、 辛かった前世とは違って、暖かい家族のもとに育つ。 「趙・俊宇」は武功を立てながら、学士としての人生を進んでいく。 新しい縁と出会い、前世での縁との関係を整理しながら、「趙・俊宇」はある境地に至るが・・・

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EC%9E%AC%EC%83%9D/2121)
---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/ComicInfo/id/621036)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/34746)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Reinkarnasi-Sang-Pendekar/3329)
description.ko:
일곱 번의 밤을 거쳐 천하제일이 된 사내, 황준우.
오랜 싸움 끝에 천지(天地)에서 죽음을 맞이했다.

헌데 눈을 떠 보니 갓난아기!
집안은 천하제일의 황금을 축적한 만금장!
고되기만 하였던 전생과 달리 금수저를 물고 태어나 버렸다!

신명나게 인생을 즐기는 한 사내의 일대기... 가 될 뻔 했으나,
인생은 그리 호락호락하지 않다!

"그런데 아버지, 도대체 공부는...... 왜 시키시는 겁니까?"

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EC%9E%AC%EC%83%9D/2121)

description.pl:
Artysta sztuk walki, twierdzący że jest „mordercą” jest pokonany w walce przez atak samobójczy i odrodzony jako dziecko miejscowego władcy. Mając świeży start, ciepłą rodzinę i małą siostrę do ochrony – zdecydował być lepszą osobą w nowym życiu.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EC%9E%AC%EC%83%9D/2121)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/34746)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Reinkarnasi-Sang-Pendekar/3329)
description.ru:
Мастер боевых искусств, заклеймивший себя как «убийца», был побеждён в битве в результате самоубийственной атаки и переродился в теле первенца в семье местного владыки. Получив возможность начать всё заново, имея любящую семью и младшую сестрёнку, которую нужно защищать, он решает стать лучшим человеком в своей новой жизни.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EC%9E%AC%EC%83%9D/2121)

description.zh:
【授权/周一、周六更新】七夜武神本是天下第一的高手，结果被法师圆空封印，最后转世投胎成为了知府公子黄俊宇，他将迎来怎样的重生呢？

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EC%9E%AC%EC%83%9D/2121)

description.en: Yuichi Nekota enters the giant school city "Private Eucalyptus Leaf Academy". Excited about his new life, he meets Chitose Arikasaki, a girl who investigates the mysteries of the school! The two form the 'After School Secret Club', and today they continue their search for the truth!
description.ja: 「私立ユーカリの葉学園」に入学した新一年生・猫田悠一くん、部活は何にしようか思案中、不可解なクイズと不思議な美少女に出くわす。彼女の名は蟻ケ崎千歳、『放課後ひみつクラブ』の部長と名乗る。学園の隠された謎を解き明かすのが使命なんだとか…。何か放っておけない気持ちになった猫田くんは入部を即決、真実を求め、二人だけのクラブ活動開始へ…!?

title.en: I Can't Fall in Love With Paperman

altTitles.zh: 我不可能和纸片人谈恋爱

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Bu Keneng He Zhi Pian Ren Tan Lian'ai

description.en: When a BL comic artist transmigrated into the princess of Liao, she resumed her career... but encountered her "dear son" who crawled out of the book and refused to be gay! Faced with a sword to her neck, will she surrender or resist? What's worse, the plot is no longer under her control; who's the mysterious person behind the scenes controlling everything?

Starting from her 8th birthday, she had a long dream that lasted for 10 years. The dream finished with ended with the death of her real mother... When things started to repeat the way they did in her dreams, she ran away to meet with the Empress in order to survive. However, in doing so she accidentally ran into Rud On, her half-brother and the Crown Prince, who hated her real mother, the King's Concubine. 

"The moment I thought I was wrong. He held out his hand to me,  'Can I stay here? 'Because this is your room now.' Why are people nice to me?"

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.ja: 杖と剣のウィストリア

altTitles.vi: Bản Hùng ca Kiếm và Pháp Trượng

description.en: The new, magical dungeon-adventure fantasy series from the author of Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Seeking to fulfill a promise to a childhood friend, Will Serfort enters Regarden Magical Academy with the goal of making it to the top of the magical world. There’s just one problem: he can’t use magic! Will his sword skills be the key to unlocking his true potential?
description.pt-br: A nova série de fantasia mágica e de aventura em masmorras do autor de "É Errado Tentar Pegar Garotas em um Calabouço?" segue a jornada de Will Serfort. Buscando cumprir uma promessa feita a uma amiga de infância, Will ingressa na Academia Mágica de Regarden com o objetivo de alcançar o topo do mundo mágico. Mas há um problema: ele não pode usar magia! Serão suas habilidades com a espada a chave para desbloquear seu verdadeiro potencial?

altTitles.ja: 異世界アイドル、推参です!

description.en: When Sakira, a new employee at an idol agency, returns home exhausted from work, she finds her destroyed home and two girls who call themselves Leah and Lumina waiting for her! Sakira, in a drunken stupor, decides to make them idols, but in fact they are a magician and a dragon from another world...!
description.es-la: "¡Quiero ser una ídol incluso si no soy humana!" Cuando Sakura, una nueva empleada que trabaja en una oficina de ídols, llega a casa exhausta de su trabajo, ¡su casa esta destruida y las chicas llamadas Lia y Rumina la estaban esperando! Debido a su borrachera, Sakura hace una promesa barata de convertir a las dos en ídols. De hecho, sus verdaderas identidades son la de una maga y una dragona de otro mundo...!?

description.en: The story centers around Ange, an electric doll, and Erio, a human raised by her. In order for Erio to experience the outside world, the two set out on a journey.
description.ja: 100年前に始まった人類とAIの戦争は、人類が電気を放棄することで決着した。電気を失った世界に生きる、最後の電気人形・アンジュと電気人形に育てられた人間・エリオの近未来スチームパンク冒険譚――。

description.en: In the 19th century, there lived a young pirate king, feared enough to be called the “Devil of the Sea”. His name is Captain Kid! With his mysterious guardian sword, Black Lightning, he sails the seven seas aboard his vessel, the Golden Drake!! What awaits him? Is it hell, or the furious waves of the ocean?! The adventurous tale of Kid and his band of rogues begins here!!

When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/choujin-x)
description.fr:
En 1998, suite à la multiplication de surhumains appelés “choujin“, le monde a été divisé en provinces autonomes. Cinquante ans après, un crash aérien va changer à tout jamais le destin de la jeune Ely, cultivatrice de “tomeïto“, et impacter le paisible quotidien des lycéens Tokio Kurohara et Azuma Higashi, qui jouent aux justiciers face aux petits malfrats de quartier…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Glénat**
description.hu:
Amikor egy repülőgép lezuhan miközben egy különös, fekete füstöt ereget, a két jó barát Tokio és Azuma úgy dönt, hogy csatlakozik az önkéntes kutató és mentőcsapathoz. Azonban egy csomó roncs helyett azt látják, hogy a repülő minimális károkat szenvedett valamint több mint 200 utas túlélte a balesetet. De mivel nem volt szükség már rájuk így elindulnak hazafelé. Viszont az úton szembejön velük egy régi ellenségük, aki valami bizar erő birtokosa lett, és elakarja pusztítani őket. Tokio és Azuma egyetlen esélye a túlélésre az, hogy szupererővel rendelkező lényekké - Úgy nevezett Choujin-okká válnak.

De a szupererő nem megoldás mindenre. Tokio-nak titokban kell tartania az erejét a családja, és iskolája elől, miközben egyre több különös esemény történik városszerte.
description.ja: 黒煙を上げ墜落していく飛行機が目撃された。それはどうやら“超人”によって引き起こされたものらしい。しかし、不思議なことにその事故は機体の損傷も少なく、何より生存者が「200名」もいた。高校生の黒原トキオと東アヅマは事故処理のボランティアの帰り、因縁の不良にいきなり絡まれるが…いつもと何か様子がちがう――
description.ru:
Азума Хигаши довольно популярный парень. И хотя он не очень крупный, но обладает хорошими боевыми навыками и сильным чувством справедливости. Также он имеет высочайшие оценки в своём классе. Прямая противоположность Азуме его друг Токио Курохара, который не слишком увлечён учёбой. Даже во время драк он выступает как простой наблюдатель. Тем не менее, невзирая на сложности и различия, эти два закадычных приятеля держатся друг друга.
Оба парня живут в префектуре Ямато – самом обычном регионе страны, который более всего известен тем, что некоторые его области были уничтожены Сверхчеловеком.
description.uk:
Азума Хіґаші доволі популярний хлопець: низенький красень із гарними бойовими навичками, має підвищене почуття справедливості, найкращі оцінки у класі та друга… свою повну протилежність - Токіо Курохару, боязкого хлопчака, який лиш спостерігає за бійками Азуми та ловить ґав на уроках. І все ж, не зважаючи на це, міці їхньої дружби можна позаздрити.

Префектура Ямато, район, де вони живуть, наполовину зруйнований Надлюдьми - особами із небезпечними надприродними здібностями. Часто саме вони влаштовують погроми чи сутички, в центрі яких цього разу й опинился хлопці. Перед загрозою смерті друзі приймають рішення стати Надлюдьми. Зміни торкаються Токіо, який вже не може бути стороннім спостерігачем, він потрапляє у пастку світу, де битва неминуча.
description.vi: Một tác phẩm mới được khắc họa dưới ngòi bút của tác giả bộ manga đình đám tokyo ghoul. "Siêu nhân X" kể về thế giới có những nhân vật đặc biệt được gọi là "Siêu nhân"[Choujin], nhân vật chính là Tokio Kurobara, một học sinh trung học ở tỉnh Yamato, hiện tại cậu ấy cùng người bạn Higashi Azuma thực thi công lý.Và rồi một ngày nọ, khi cả hai rơi vào tình thế hiểm nghèo bắt buộc chỉ còn cách dùng một ống tiêm kỳ lạ...
description.es-la: Azuma Higashi es un chico bastante popular. Aunque puede ser algo pequeño, tiene fuertes habilidades de lucha y sus calificaciones son las mejores de su clase. Esto es lo opuesto a Tokio Kurohara, su amigo que no escucha en clase y es simplemente un espectador mientras Azuma pelea. No obstante, el vínculo de estos dos amigos de la infancia es fuerte, sin importar cuán diferentes sean. Los dos viven en la prefectura de Yamato, un distrito increíblemente ordinario con algunas áreas destruidas por Choujin. Los choujin son humanos con poderes sobrenaturales y peligrosos, a menudo la causa de la destrucción circundante. Mientras regresaban a casa, Tokio y Azuma se encuentran con un Choujin, que amenaza con matarlos. Sin posibilidad de escapar, Tokio y Azuma toman una decisión crucial: convertirse en Choujin. Con estos nuevos poderes adquiridos, Tokio ya no puede ser el espectador que alguna vez fue, ahora atrapado en un mundo donde la lucha es inevitable.
